briefTitle: BAY63-2521:Long-term Extension Study in Patients With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
officialTitle: Long-term Extension, Multicentre, Multi-national Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Oral BAY63-2521 (1mg,1.5 mg, 2.0 mg, 2.5 mg Tid) in Patients With Symptomatic Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH)
summary: Patients who have completed the 12 weeks treatment of the PATENT-1 trial (study number 12934) will be asked to participate in this long term extension study with BAY63-2521.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From administration of first dose of study medication in PATENT-2 up to 2 days after end of treatment with study medication, up to 10 years and 5 months.
